General.Name: NTPM Holdings Bhd
General.Description: NTPM Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and distributes tissue paper and personal care products in Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam, and internationally. The company operates through two segments, Tissue Paper Products and Personal Care Products. It offers tissue products consisting of facial tissues, toilet papers, kitchen towel rolls, serviettes, and napkins and paper core under the PREMIER, ROYAL GOLD, Cutie, and green world brands; and personal care products, such as feminine hygienic products, cotton products, facial cottons, wet tissues, baby and adult diapers, sanitary products, and incontinent products under the INTIMATE, Soft Baby Wipes, Sanitizing Wipes, DIAPEX, Budget, Vina, Blossom, and PREMIER Cotton brands, as well as semi-finished paper rolls. The company also provides tissue products, soaps, and dispensers to companies and institutions under the CONV and ROYAL GOLD brands. In addition, it is involved in the trading of tissues, paper products, and personal care products; provision of integrated logistics services, and information technology support and services; and wholesale of pulp paper and sanitary products. Further, the company engages in the research and development of production technology and biotechnology; and recycling of waste materials related to paper industry, as well as offers freight forwarding, transportation, and logistics services. NTPM Holdings Berhad was founded in 1975 and is headquartered in Nibong Tebal, Malaysia.
